content: From breakfast to the Hours of Indulgence in The Terrace, with its captivating city views rivaling rooftop restaurants in New York, it is little moments of sophisticated indulgence that elevate the everyday at WestHouse. Hotel Residents enjoy these culinary privileges throughout their stay, a rare and exceptional offering among luxury hotels in New York. And with an enviable location in the very heart of the world’s most food-centric city, WestHouse Hotel New York Residents can gain coveted reservations at famed Manhattan restaurants.
